features.name: Menu System
features.description: Displays products categorized by type with real-time price formatting in ARS ($ 0.00).

features.name: Cart & Checkout
features.description: Allows users to add items, manage quantities, and place orders with ARS formatting for totals.

features.name: Order Management (Staff/Admin)
features.description: Dashboard for viewing and updating order status (pending, preparing, ready, delivered).

features.name: Product Management (Admin)
features.description: Full CRUD for products, including image uploads to Supabase Storage.

features.name: Employee Management (Admin)
features.description: System for admins to register new employees directly from the dashboard using Silent Signup.

features.name: Authentication & RBAC
features.description: Secure login and role-based access control for Admins and Employees, with logout available in the Dashboard.
